properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 2:56PM PST until January 11 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.

* WHERE...Western Mojave Desert.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong gusts and areas of blowing dust and sand will
create hazardous driving conditions along roads and highways
in western San Bernardino County. Tree limbs could be blown
down and a few power outages may result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong west winds are expected to continue
across the western portions of San Bernardino County through the
remainder of the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING
